div.p: This case-insensitive code system http://tecnomod-um.org/CodeSystem/stroke-arrival-mode-cs defines the following codes:

tr.td: The patient arrived via personal or non-medical transport from their home or directly from the scene of the incident.
The patient was referred and transported privately from GP.
Emergency Medical Services (EMS) transported the patient from GP.
The patient was transferred from a specialized stroke center, indicating prior specialized care
Emergency Medical Services (EMS) transported the patient from their home or directly from the scene where the stroke symptoms began.
The patient was transferred from another hospital

description.value: Codes indicating the level of care provided during the patient's initial day(s) in the hospital.

definition.value: The patient arrived via personal or non-medical transport from their home or directly from the scene of the incident.
The patient was referred and transported privately from GP.
Emergency Medical Services (EMS) transported the patient from GP.
The patient was transferred from a specialized stroke center, indicating prior specialized care
Emergency Medical Services (EMS) transported the patient from their home or directly from the scene where the stroke symptoms began.
The patient was transferred from another hospital
